session_info.title: Peaceful Evening Wind-Down
session_info.description: Gentle sequence to release the day and prepare for rest

activities.name: Three Cleansing Breaths
activities.instructions: Inhale deeply through nose, exhale completely through mouth
activities.purpose: Release the energy of the day

activities.name: Intention Setting
activities.instructions: Place hand on heart, set intention to let go and rest

poses.name: Seated Side Bend
poses.instructions: Sit cross-legged, reach one arm over head, lean gently

poses.name: Seated Twist
poses.instructions: Hand behind you, gently twist spine

poses.name: Tabletop Hip Circles
poses.instructions: On hands and knees, slowly circle hips

poses.name: Supported Child's Pose
poses.instructions: Knees wide, pillow under torso, turn head to one side
poses.benefits: Calms nervous system, relieves lower back

poses.name: Legs Up the Wall
poses.instructions: Lie on back, legs up wall or chair

practice.name: Gratitude Practice
instructions: Think of three things from your day you're grateful for
Send yourself loving-kindness: 'May I rest peacefully'

closing: When ready, slowly transition to your bedtime routine
sleep_tip: Keep the peaceful feeling as you prepare for sleep
